name: NORTH CAMBRIA FUEL COMPANY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES
name_abbreviation: North Cambria Fuel Co. v. Commonwealth

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: NORTH CAMBRIA FUEL COMPANY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Beverly A. Gazza and Bonya & Gazza, Indiana, for appellant.
Stanley R. Geary, Henry Ingram, Stephen G. Allen, and Stephen C. Braverman, Buchanan Ingersoll, P.C., Philadelphia, for Pennsylvania Coal Ass’n, amicus curiae.
Theresa Grencik and Zelda Curtiss, Asst. Counsel, Dept. of Environmental Resources, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
648 A.2d 775
NORTH CAMBRIA FUEL COMPANY, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1994.
Decided Oct. 12, 1994.
Beverly A. Gazza and Bonya & Gazza, Indiana, for appellant.
Stanley R. Geary, Henry Ingram, Stephen G. Allen, and Stephen C. Braverman, Buchanan Ingersoll, P.C., Philadelphia, for Pennsylvania Coal Ass’n, amicus curiae.
Theresa Grencik and Zelda Curtiss, Asst. Counsel, Dept. of Environmental Resources, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
